
---

# 9898-MTG-Generators Copilot Instructions

---

When contributing to 9898-MTG-Generator, please adhere to the following guidelines to ensure consistency and maintainability:

•	Use clear, descriptive variable and function names related to 9898-MTG.

•	Prefer modular functions for each generator or utility.

•	Follow the existing code style and formatting conventions in this repository.

•	Write concise, well-documented code with comments where logic is complex.

•	Avoid hardcoding values; use configuration or constants where possible.

•	Ensure all new code is testable and, if applicable, add or update tests.

•	Do not include unrelated features or code outside the scope of MTG or RPG generators.

•	Use English for all code comments and documentation.

•	If adding dependencies, prefer lightweight and well-maintained packages.

---

By following these guidelines, you will help maintain the quality and coherence of the 9898-MTG-Generator project.

Thank you for contributing!

---
